svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;

pageHeight="1169" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="X89fYZ-ELECHrKvlwhN6-12" value="" style="verticalLabelPosition=bottom;verticalAlign=top;html=1;shape=mxgraph.basic.diag_snip_rect;dx=6;whiteSpace=wrap;shadow=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="80" y="149.3114186851211" width="430" height="400.0657439446366" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="X89fYZ-ELECHrKvlwhN6-13" value="" style="shape=partialRectangle;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;bottom=0;right=0;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="80" y="122.51923076923076" width="100" height="80.4152249134948" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="X89fYZ-ELECHrKvlwhN6-15" value="<p style=""><br></p><div style=""><span style="background-color: transparent;"><font face="Times New Roman" style="font-size: 11px; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">Classify the sentiment expressed towards the given aspect term in the following sentence.&nbsp;</font></span></div><div style=""><span style="background-color: transparent;"><font face="Times New Roman" style="font-size: 11px; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">Choose either 'positive', 'neutral', or 'negative'.&nbsp;</font></span></div><div style=""><br></div><div style=""><font face="Times New Roman"><span style="font-size: 11px;">Below are some examples of sentences with their corresponding sentiment labels:</span></font></div><div style=""><br></div><div style=""><font face="Times New Roman"><span style="font-size: 11px;">### Sentence: <i>It's nice that the restaurant added a service charge to the bill to make sure the&nbsp;</i></span></font></div><div style=""><font face="Times New Roman"><span style="font-size: 11px;"><i><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>servers are paid well and that there are no surprises on the bill.</i><br></span></font></div><div style=""><font face="Times New Roman"><span style="font-size: 11px;">### Aspect: <i>service&nbsp;</i></span></font></div><div style=""><font face="Times New Roman"><span style="font-size: 11px;">### Sentiment: <i>positive</i></span></font></div><div style=""><font face="Times New Roman"><span style="font-size: 11px;"><br></span></font></div><div style=""><div><font face="Times New Roman"><span style="font-size: 11px;">### Sentence: <i>The restaurant had no service charge.&nbsp;</i></span></font></div><div><font face="Times New Roman"><span style="font-size: 11px;">### Aspect:<i> service</i></span></font></div><div><font face="Times New Roman"><span style="font-size: 11px;">### Sentiment: <i>neutral</i></span></font></div><div><font face="Times New Roman"><span style="font-size: 11px;"><br></span></font></div><div><div><font face="Times New Roman"><span style="font-size: 11px;">### Sentence: <i>The waiter was extremely rude.&nbsp;</i></span></font></div><div><font face="Times New Roman"><span style="font-size: 11px;">### Aspect: <i>service</i></span></font></div></div><div><font face="Times New Roman"><span style="font-size: 11px;">### Sentiment: <i>negative</i></span></font></div><div><font face="Times New Roman"><span style="font-size: 11px;"><br></span></font></div><div><font face="Times New Roman"><span style="font-size: 11px;">Now classify the following sentence:</span></font></div><div><font face="Times New Roman"><span style="font-size: 11px;"><br></span></font></div><div><div><font face="Times New Roman"><span style="font-size: 11px;">Sentence: <i>But the service is HORRID!</i></span></font></div><div><font face="Times New Roman"><span style="font-size: 11px;">Aspect:<i> service</i></span></font></div></div></div><div style=""><font face="Times New Roman"><span style="font-size: 11px;">Sentiment:</span></font></div><div><br></div><div><font style="color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));" face="Courier New"><font style="font-size: 11px;">negative</font><br></font><div><br></div></div>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;shadow=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="92" y="120.50839384609125" height="35.75384615384616" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="X89fYZ-ELECHrKvlwhN6-16" value="" </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

path.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 219px; margin-left: 18px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;

span.font: Classify the sentiment expressed towards the given aspect term in the following sentence.

font.span: Below are some examples of sentences with their corresponding sentiment labels:
### Sentence: It's nice that the restaurant added a service charge to the bill to make sure the

span.i: servers are paid well and that there are no surprises on the bill.

font.span: ### Sentence: The restaurant had no service charge.
### Sentence: The waiter was extremely rude.
Sentence: But the service is HORRID!

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 97px; height: 1px; padding-top: 19px; margin-left: 16px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
